subject: CNN Alerts: bush
body:
CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
Virginia Tech report: Share mental health data

06/13/07 06:18 PM, EDT
Educators, doctors and police sometimes don't know when they can legally share information about potentially dangerous students "and the resulting confusion may chill legitimate information sharing," a federal report on the Virginia Tech shootings concluded Wednesday.
